name: Typhlosion
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.

abilities.name: Blazing Energy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. All Energy attached to your Pokémon are {R} Energy instead of their usual type until the end of your turn. (This includes cards that come into play on this turn.)

attacks.name: Lost Flame
attacks.effect: Put 2 Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon in the Lost Zone.
